subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Storm waived Sheryl Swoopes, a three-time W.N.B.A. most valuable player and three-time Olympic gold medalist, a day before her 2009 contract would have become guaranteed. Coach Brian Agler said the weekend move was made to clear space under the $803,000 salary cap. Since having back surgery in October 2007, Swoopes, 37, is averaging less than half her career scoring average of 15.8 points.
